group_1.textRight: A-a-a-at last! The test is going to start!

group_1.textLeft: Karin, why are you so nervous?

group_1.textRight: B-because...this will determine whether you@can keep being a maid.

group_1.textLeft: Hm. Well, now I'm getting nervous.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! Oh no, what should we do?! Is it@my fault?!
[chara:101201:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Wha, you're teasing me? Don't be mean...

group_1.textLeft: I just need to do what I always do. That's@all.

group_1.textRight: I love your attitude, darling.
It doesn't mean anything if you can only@do it for the test, now does it?
Nice to see you again, Master.
So, are you ready, Nagitan?
This here is what you'll need to do!
Your test will be...
...to please the next master who returns.
Yes, but that's what's important.
By the way, this is how I'll be evaluating @you...
First, whether you're interacting with@customers appropriately.
Show them to their seats, take their order,@pay attention to them, that sort of thing.
Basically, I'll be watching to see if you@understand the basics of customer service.
Second, how well you meet your master's@needs.
I'll be looking to see if you're behaving@considerately toward them.
In other words, whether or not you're@showing special care.
That doesn't sound like Nagitan's forte,@to be honest...

group_1.textLeft: I can't deny that, but I'm not the same as@I was before.

group_1.textRight: Last, and most important, is whether your@master leaves with a smile.
You'll be evaluated on those three things!
All right, your master has returned!

group_1.textCenter: Huh? This isn't a regular cafe?
